description: Alterations to roof to extend existing loft conversion including replacement of existing rear dormer window, addition of 1no. additional dormer window to rear roof slope, addition of 1no. dormer window to northern roof slope. Alterations to single storey rear extension including, increase in height of existing parapet, changes to windows and doors involving insertion of 1no. new window to replace existing door and 2no. windows to rear elevation, and replacement of double doors and side windows and insertion of 2no. new window to replace existing door and window to side elevation. Insertion of 1no. new window to replace existing door on front elevation. Insertion of 1no. rooflight to ground floor flat roof and 2no. rooflights to crown roof. New bin store to front. New paving to front garden. Installation of 1no. air conditioning unit to rear garden with associated paving. Installation of new external lighting and CCTV cameras. Replacement of SVPs on side (northern) elevation. Replacement of fencing. Installation of semi-recessed electrical box. Associated internal alterations including; Ground floor, addition of new door opening between kitchen and dining room and reinstatement of wall and blocked up door to create a gym. First floor, refurbishment of 2no. bathrooms, relocation of door to office. Removal of partition walls at second floor (Listed Building Consent)
decision_conditions: C405 - Roof not to be used as balcony
Listed building works to match existing
C102 - Listed Bldg Csnt Time Limit
